page.title: 19The Church in the Parish
page.content: In our area there is only one church building (and two redundant Methodist chapels),though the area includes land in four parishes,three of which are served by one priest. Formal,organised church activities in these parishes are few.Apart from weekly worship in the church they include the choir,bellringers,Mothers Union,Church School,and the organisation of community events such as fetes,Jubilee and other celebrations,Public House Harvest Festivals,&c. In addition,the Church (and its graveyard) holds a central place in the life of the community and through its members is active in most community activities:Parish Council,Evergreen club,Men's Club,Womens institute,Football club,Youth club,Bingo Club,&c,&c.
